        public Optional<String> revisionIdOrAbsent(String name)
                                    throws InterruptedException
        Specified by:
        revisionIdOrAbsent in interface VersionControlCmdLineInterface
        Parameters:
        name - Bookmark name, e.g master
        Returns:
        Global revision ID for given name or Optional.empty() if the bookmark doesn't exist or an error was encountered. If you want to handle the exception use VersionControlCmdLineInterface.revisionId(String)

        InterruptedException

                                               String revisionIdTwo)

        Specified by:
        commonAncestorOrAbsent in interface VersionControlCmdLineInterface
        Returns:
        Revision ID that is an ancestor for both revisionIdOne and revisionIdTwo or Optional.empty() is there is no common ancestor or an error was encountered. If you want to handle the error use VersionControlCmdLineInterface.commonAncestor(String, String)
